H0.text: What is the name of the one-eyed mutant and important character in ‘Futurama’. Turanga

H1.text: What is the name of the one-eyed mutant and important character in ‘Futurama’. Mutley

H2.text: What is the name of the one-eyed mutant and important character in ‘Futurama’. Zara

H3.text: What is the name of the one-eyed mutant and important character in ‘Futurama’. LEELA

A4.text: Turanga Leela is a fictional character from the animated television series Futurama.

A5.text: Turanga Leela is the least mutated mutant ever born.
